item.title: Poland Rebuilding v2.5.9 ETS2
item.description:
Poland Rebuilding v2.5.9 ETS2

Version 2.5.9 is a maintenance update which adds support for new versions of ETS2 1.50 & PM 2.70.

Changes:
Adapted map for ETS2 1.50 patch and ProMods 2.70
Updated road prefabs and textures

This version REQUIRES:
Promods 2.70
DLC: Going East, Scandinavia, Vive la France, Italia, Beyond the Baltic Sea, Road to the Black Sea, Iberia, West Balkans.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: DAF XF 106-116 Megamod v9.0 ETS2
item.description:
DAF XF 106-116 Megamod v9.0 ETS2

– Standalone
– Sold in DAF salons
– 3 cabin options;
– 27 chassis options
– Window animation
– New shadows
– A lot of tuning
– Full light mask
– Accessories for the cabin

Adapted for game version 1.50



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Bau Sider Videira 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
Bau Sider Videira 1.50 ETS2

This pack adds the Videira brand (a company from Santa Catarina) range of tarpaulin sider trailers to your set. With a wide range of variations, you can configure your sider from the 2-axle trailer to the 26-meter wheeled train.
This pack also includes traffic mod, adding some sider variants to ets2 traffic, and I also bring you the freight market.
For those who don’t know, the freight market is the game mode in which you don’t need a trailer.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: The Godfathers Freighter T-Liner Trailers Paintjob Pack 14 v1.0 ATS
item.description:
The Godfathers Freighter T-Liner Trailers Paintjob Pack 14 v1.0 ATS

The Godfather’s Freighter T Liner Trailers Paintjob Pack 14

The Godfather’s Mods Company brings to u the 14th Paintjob pack for the Freighter T Liner Trailer witch was built by SWR Customs before they shut down there site and has 25 paintjobs in this pack for the trailer that can be used in Single / B Double and Road Train formats in Drop Deck / Flat Deck & Belly Deck formats do note if u dont own the trailer even the 1.45x edition or 1.48x edition works 100% fine still with a few light and shadows issues.

The Skins and Trailer work 100% fine with both ATS & ETS2.
– Bascik Transport
– Blenners Transport
– Bobbins Transport Pty Ltd
– Brenics Limited
– Campbells Fertilisers Australasia
– Dynes Transport
– Emmerson Transport Limited
– HB Transport
– Heagney Bros
– Inverell Freighters
– J&K Bloomfield
– Kellogg’s Corn Flakes 100 Years Special Edition
– Main Line Distribution

– Morgans Long Distance Transport
– Mount Isa Pets & Produce
– Shaw’s Darwin Transport
– South West Bulk Express INC
– SRV Road Freight Services Black Listed
– Streamline Freight Solutions
– Trappers Transport LTD
– T-Rex Logistics
– Underwood & Weld Co Inc
– Williamson Transport
– Wymap Group

– You can combo up the trailers in this pack with our truck mod packs folks so head to our site at mega.nz today link will be seen with the keygen on our discord server..

– Subscribe to The Godfather’s You Tube channel Australia Worldwide Entertainment to get the latest ATS Gameplay witch gets uploaded and Premiered 1st and after updated to 4K 60FPS HD almost every day with new Paintjobs of Trucks & Trailers on each video and all our paintjobs get released in our upcoming packs 1st seen on our you tube channel so do check us out its worth watching..

– Follow Australia Worldwide Entertainment at our new Discord Server today folks for all the great ATS/ETS2 Stuff with your Australian Don The Godfather as we talk about the sims and latest News on our mods and links to new Videos of gameplay from us link to our discord server can be founded on our home screen of our you tube channel or in any of our latest ATS uploaded videos witch get loaded daily. and on weekends between 3 to 8 videos of ats gameplay starting Friday’s all the way to Sundays all of our paintjobs we do for trucks and trailers get shown 1st before getting released to the public so subscribe to our you tube channel today..

You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder.
